languages.text: На данном ранге архетипа персонаж получает усиление {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g} своего архетипа.
languages.original_text: At this rank of the archetype, the character gains an improvement of their special ability that can be used as {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}.

languages.text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.
At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.
At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

languages.text: Bei diesem Archetyp-Rang können die Charaktere die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und die Fähigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ihres Archetyps verbessern.
languages.original_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: Bei diesem Doktrin-Rang können die Charaktere die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und die Fähigkeit {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ihrer Doktrin verbessern.

languages.text: En atteignant ce rang d’archétype, le personnage peut améliorer l’{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} et la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g} correspondant à son archétype.
languages.original_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: En atteignant ce rang de doctrine, le personnage peut améliorer l’{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} et la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g} correspondant à sa doctrine.

languages.text: En este rango de arquetipo, los personajes pueden mejorar las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g} de su arquetipo.
languages.original_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: En este rango de arquetipo, los personajes pueden mejorar las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g} de su arquetipo.

languages.text: 到达此职业等级时，角色可以强化该职业的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力。
languages.original_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: 到达此职业等级时，角色可以强化该职业的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力。

languages.text: このタイプランクでは、キャラクターは自身のタイプの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}の能力を強化できる。
languages.original_text: At this archetype rank, characters can enhance their archetype's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} ability.

traits.locale_text: このタイプランクでは、キャラクターは自身のタイプの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}の能力を強化できる。
